name: Orphan - Sound of Silence
description:
8/7/2015 - release!


Orphan is a horror indie game created on the Unity 3D engine in 2015.

The author of production is Kamil Piechura.


Great sound design take you into the deepest nightmare and original graphics design make you feel real darkness of this horror.



Story of game, let you know the history of the tragic story of an abandoned orphanage and discover its secrets.



Beacuse you are the father and your daughter suddenly disappears near this place. Will you be able to overcome the nightmare of your mind and find her alive?

Good luck…
